title: Ramsey Orta is imprisoned for filming Eric Garner's death.
subtitle: Ramsey Orta was sentenced to four years in prison in October 2016, but the charges were not specifically related to his photograph of the officer Eric Garner who was involved in the death.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Ramsey Orta went to prison to film the murder meeting between Eric Garner and NYPD officers.
